name: Final Cut Pro Library
summary: Learn about .FCPBUNDLE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The FCPBUNDLE file is located in the following directory: MacHD/​Library/​Users/​[username]/​Movies/​Final Cut Backups

description: Library created and used by Final Cut Pro X (FCPX), a professional video editor; contains files that make up a library in FCPX, which includes a .FLEXOLIBRARY file, .FCPEVENT files describing events, and a .PLIST file that contains backup metadata.
